short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set your default search to Uzvy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set your default search engine to Uzvy in Chrome.  Each day you search with Uzvy, you save on average 2 trees, countless wildlife, and keep tons of CO2 sequestered in the ground. As a member of Uzvy, you can win prizes as well.  Uzvy contributes at least half its revenues every month towards purchasing forests for preservation.
